title: 2004년 Williams v. Security National Bank 사건
summary: 미국 Iowa, IA 법원 판결 사건. 사건명: Williams v. Security National Bank. 판결일: 2004-04-26. 법원: District Court, N.D. Iowa.
description:
## 사건 정보

**사건명**: John Franklin WILLIAMS, Peter Martin Williams, and James Oliver Williams, Plaintiffs, v. SECURITY NATIONAL BANK, Defendant
**판결일**: 2004-04-26
**법원**: District Court, N.D. Iowa
**관할**: Iowa, IA

**판사**: Bennett

## 변호인

Dana A. Dwiggins, Mark A. Solomon, Lionel, Sawyer & Collins, Las Vegas, NV, Jay Elliott Denne, Stanley E. Munger, Munger, Reinschmidt & Denne, Sioux City, IA, for Plaintiffs., Glianny Fagundo-Toro, Michael P. Bruyere, Lord, Bissell & Brook, LLP, Atlanta, GA, Maurice B. Nieland, Rebecca A. Nelson, Rawlings Neiland Probasco Kil-linger Ellwanger Jacobs, et al, Sioux City, IA, for Defendant.

## 인용

- 314 F. Supp. 2d 886

v.
